meeting_info.organization: City Council Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla, Dallas, TX

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes of the March 26, 2024 meeting of the Quality of Life, Arts and Culture Committee.

agenda_items.title: Library Strategic + Facilities Plan
agenda_items.description: Briefing on the Library Strategic and Facilities Plan.

agenda_items.title: Horse-Drawn Carriage Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the Horse-Drawn Carriage program.

agenda_items.title: North Texas Municipal Water District Sanitary Sewer Overflow Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the sanitary sewer overflow from the North Texas Municipal Water District.

agenda_items.title: April 24, 2024 City Council Agenda Item 3
agenda_items.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the architectural services contract with Brown Reynolds Watford Architects, Inc. to provide soil testing and to increase the reimbursable expenses for the Dallas Airport System Signage at Dallas Executive Airport.

agenda_items.title: April 24, 2024 City Council Agenda Item 4
agenda_items.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 2 to the engineering services contract with Kimley-Horn and Associates, Inc. to provide construction phase services for the additional trail limits for the Lemmon Avenue Streetscape Enhancements Project at Dallas Love Field.

agenda_items.title: April 24, 2024 City Council Agenda Item 5
agenda_items.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 7 to the professional services contract with M. Arthur Gensler Jr. & Associates, Inc. for major maintenance and repairs to Parking Garages A and B at Dallas Love Field.

agenda_items.title: April 24, 2024 City Council Agenda Item 18
agenda_items.description: Authorize the execution of a three-year service contract for providing multimedia messaging services for the City of Dallasâ€™ Women, Infant, Children Program.

agenda_items.title: April 24, 2024 City Council Agenda Item 33
agenda_items.description: Authorize an increase in the construction services contract with BAR Constructors, Inc. for additional work associated with the construction of a new pump station at the Elm Fork Water Treatment Plant.

financial_items.description: Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the architectural services contract for Dallas Airport System Signage.
Supplemental Agreement No. 2 to the engineering services contract for Lemmon Avenue Streetscape Enhancements Project.
Supplemental Agreement No. 7 for major maintenance and repairs to Parking Garages A and B.
Three-year service contract for multimedia messaging services for Women, Infant, Children Program.
Increase in construction services contract for new pump station at Elm Fork Water Treatment Plant.
